metadata.title: CVE-2023-35963 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple OS command injection vulnerabilities exist in the decompressionfunctionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially crafted wave file can lead toarbitrary command execution. A victim would need to open a malicious fileto trigger these vulnerabilities.This vulnerability concerns decompressionin the `vcd2lxt2` utility.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
